### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

events.message: [refactor] helper function for adding orphan parents to txrequest

[refactor] make GetCandidatePeers take uint256 and in-out vector

The txrequest fuzzer uses uint256s, not transactions, so it's best if
GetCandidatePeers takes that as an input.
pass P2PTxInvStore init args to P2PInterface init

test fix: make peer who sends MSG_TX announcement non-wtxidrelay

Otherwise, it is not meaningful to test whether the announcement is
ignored, because *all* announcements of this type are ignored.
[p2p] assign just 1 random announcer in AddChildrenToWorkSet

comments.body: they are added as new invs IFF they are deemed good candidates for resolution
documentation should note that the list is appended to
Thanks for the update even though on second reading it was already ok :)
